definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Sometimes, and not just in Andes, a destination is said to be so many cigarettes away.
sentences.chinese: 有时，不仅在安第斯山，人们会说某地在几枝烟之外。

sentences.english: I like to plug in an audiobook while I´m on the bus or walking somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在公交车或步行去某地的时候听有声读物。

sentences.english: That’s when you know you’ve actually gone somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 只有那些地方才会让你觉得你确实到过某地。

sentences.english: Choose one place and invite your classmates or the teachers to go.
sentences.chinese: 学生小组活动，举牌邀请去某地，同时配乐。

sentences.english: The experimental research on leachability of a semi- weathered ion-adsorption type rare earths mineral was performed.
sentences.chinese: 对某地半风化离子型稀土矿进行了可浸性试验研究。

sentences.english: In global history, what really matters is living standards.
sentences.chinese: 全球史的终极议题是某时某地的生活水准。

sentences.english: It's with the person who's playing in the Bronx somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 创造力属于在布朗克斯某地表演的人。

sentences.english: Where can I take the bus to the shopping center?
sentences.chinese: 问对方在哪里可以坐车到某地的时候，用这个句型。

sentences.english: The video is listed by the uploader as being from somewhere in China.
sentences.chinese: 这个视频的上传者列出视频源于中国某地。

sentences.english: What's more notable is that sb. use sth. at sw. to do sth.
sentences.chinese: 更值得注意的是某人在某地使用某物做了某事。

sentences.english: Frequently used in international trade to make funds available in a foreign location.
sentences.chinese: 常用于国际贸易中，以使资金可在国外某地抵用。

sentences.english: The doctor asked my father to go anywhere for some time for a change of air.
sentences.chinese: 医生劝我父亲到某地一段时间换换环境。

sentences.english: And this health resort somewhere in the Moscow Region hasn't become an exception.
sentences.chinese: 这家位于莫斯科某地的疗养院也无法幸免。

sentences.english: A combined flotation-hydrometallurgical technology was proposed for treating a refractory copper ore in Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 针对四川某地铜矿石特性，进行了选冶工艺试验研究。

sentences.english: These robbers are now flying low somewhere in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 这伙强盗现在潜伏在欧洲某地。

sentences.english: This domain name had been redirected to Shanghai, PRC.
sentences.chinese: 这个域名被指向了上海黄浦区某地。

definition: parts of the country other than where one is
Henan province (Honan) in central China, abbr. 豫, capital Zhengzhou 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
native place/place of origin/home state or region

Hainan Province, in the South China Sea, short name 瓊|琼[Qiong2], capital Haikou 海口/Hainan Island/Hainan District of Wuhai City 烏海市|乌海市[Wu1 hai3 Shi4], Inner Mongolia/Hainan Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 海南藏族自治州[Hai3 nan2 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
Anhui Province (Anhwei) in south central China, abbr. 皖[Wan3], capital Hefei 合肥[He2 fei2]
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
Jiangxi province (Kiangsi) in southeast China, abbr. 赣, capital Nanchang 南昌
